mapper.select:
select a.faqno, a.setbukdoorclcode, a.question, a.fcontent, b.name as writer, a.regist_date, a.secretyn, a.faqyn, a.answer from tb_faq a, tb_member b where a.writer = b.memberno and a.faqyn = 'N'
order by a.faqno desc

select count(*) from tb_faq a where a.faqno is not null
order by a.regist_date desc
select a.faqno, a.setbukdoorclcode, a.question, a.fcontent, a.regist_date, b.name as writer, a.answer from tb_faq a, tb_member b where faqno=#{faqno} and a.writer = b.memberno
insert into tb_faq( faqno, setbukdoorclcode, question, fcontent, writer, secretyn ) values ( faqno_seq.nextval, #{setbukdoorclcode}, #{question}, #{fcontent}, #{writer}, #{secretyn})
select question as 문의내용, answer as 답변 from tb_faq where faqyn = 'Y' order by faqno asc;
